== Javier Carranza ==

=== About me ===

* I'm a <nowiki>[[http://www.guadalinex.org/|Guadalinex ]]</nowiki> developer since February '04

* I'm actually in NM process in <nowiki>[[http://nm.debian.org/nmlist.php|Debian]]</nowiki>

* I am a member and co-founder of <nowiki>[[http://xinug.eurodev.net/|Xinug]]</nowiki> LUG in Jerez (Spain), and a member of <nowiki>[[http://www.hispalinux.es/|Hispalinux]]</nowiki>

* I'm interesting in getting involved and contributing with Ubuntu because my efforts on Debian and Guadalinex. I feel all my efforts can be appreciated in Ubuntu and I'd like supporting it.

=== April '05 Conference Interests ===

* Coordination between derivatives Spanish distributions (i.e. Guadalinex) and Ubuntu.

=== Packaging interesting ===

* <nowiki>[[http://www.ribbonsoft.com/qcad.html|Qcad]]</nowiki> which I'm already packaging in Debian and Guadalinex.

* <nowiki>[[http://heroinewarrior.com/cinelerra.php3|Cinelerra]]</nowiki> which I'm already packaging in Guadalinex.

=== Availability ===

* Part time, I'm also currently working on Guadalinex/Debian.
